Lyric:
[00:02.048]What would I do without your smart mouth

[00:20.738]I'm on your magical mystery ride

[00:36.425]But I'm breathing fine
[00:40.448]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind
[00:47.958]'Cause all of me
[00:50.766]Loves all of you
[00:54.606]Love your curves and all your edges
[00:58.276]All your perfect imperfections
